com.hms_networks.americas.sc.historicaldata
Class HistoricalDataQueueManager

java.lang.Object
  com.hms_networks.americas.sc.historicaldata.HistoricalDataQueueManager
public class HistoricalDataQueueManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class to manage queueing historical tag data and retrieving it in chunks based on a configurable time span of data.

Since:
1.0
Author:
HMS Networks, MU Americas Solution Center

getFifoNextSpanData

public static java.util.ArrayList getFifoNextSpanData(boolean startNewTimeTracker,
                                                      boolean includeTagGroupA,
                                                      boolean includeTagGroupB,
                                                      boolean includeTagGroupC,
                                                      boolean includeTagGroupD)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
Get the historical log data for the specified tag groups within the next FIFO queue time span.

Parameters:
startNewTimeTracker - if new time tracker should be generated, not read from storage
includeTagGroupA - if tag group A data should be included
includeTagGroupB - if tag group B data should be included
includeTagGroupC - if tag group C data should be included
includeTagGroupD - if tag group D data should be included
Returns:
historical log data
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if unable to read or write files
